summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all 8 requirements with full CRUD functionality, Internet Identity authentication, responsive design, and a cohesive visual design system using emerald/teal colors. The diff shows complete backend and frontend implementations with proper state management, validation, and user feedback mechanisms.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup functionality with ProfileSetupModal component and user profile management (name field)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states no team collaboration features. The profile system with name storage appears to be beyond basic authentication requirements and was not requested in any of the 8 requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode theme support with ThemeProvider from next-themes
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies a cohesive visual design system with a modern color palette but does not mention dark mode or theme switching capabilities. This is an additional feature not in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin access control system with role-based permissions
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend includes admin role checking and access control mechanisms not mentioned in any requirement. REQ-1 only specifies basic authentication and authorization, not role-based access control with admin privileges.
